subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise.
snippet: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise.
